long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pacman - Chrome Extension
Get ready to gobble up some fun with Pacman, the classic arcade game now available as a Chrome Extension!

Join Pacman on his thrilling quest through a maze filled with dots, power pellets, and pesky ghosts. Your goal is simple: eat all the dots while avoiding the ghosts that chase you. Use quick reflexes and strategic moves to navigate the maze and outsmart your foes. When you consume a power pellet, you can turn the tables and chase the ghosts for extra points!

With its iconic graphics and catchy soundtrack, Pacman delivers a nostalgic gaming experience that appeals to players of all ages. Each level presents new challenges, making every game session exciting and addictive.

Perfect for a quick gaming break or a nostalgic trip down memory lane, Pacman promises endless entertainment and challenges.

Pause: "P"
Mute: "M"
